ECM_Timer_v2_warning_desc: Some of your changes may not take effect until the next heist.
hide_hudbox_desc: Hides the white corners and black background for the ecm timer.
infoboxes_desc: Enable an ECM timer in stealth.
pager_jam_desc: Displays an icon on the ecm timer when it blocks pagers.
animate_low_desc: Animates the timer text when the remaining time is past 3 seconds.
pocket_ecm_desc: Also displays when pocket ecms are active.
ECM_Timer_v2OptionsButtonDescID: Change the color of this HUD element to your own liking.
ECM_Timer_v2ColorOption: Change the color of this HUD element to your own liking.
